title: Amexio Calendar Component
description: Amexio Calendar is way of showing your daily, weekly, month and yearly appointments or meetings

gridData.name: events
gridData.description: This can be proper event array consisting of that standard objects. For array structure please take a look into source tab

gridData.name: calendar-date
gridData.description: User can set calendar date, by default it is current date.

gridData.name: event-color-grouping
gridData.description: Event color grouping. Event will be grouped on predefined color and bakground color

gridData.name: onEventClicked
gridData.description: Emits event data when clicked on event.

gridData.name: Tab
gridData.description: Navigates on Tab click to the next element.

gridData.name: Shift+Tab
gridData.description: Navigates on Shift+Tab click to the previous element.

gridData.name: Left Arrow
gridData.description: Navigates focus from current active element to the previous active element.

gridData.name: Down Arrow
gridData.description: Navigates focus from current active element to the previous active element.

gridData.name: Right Arrow
gridData.description: Navigates focus from current active element to the previous active element.

gridData.name: Up Arrow
gridData.description: Navigates focus from current active element to the next active element.

gridData.name: Enter
gridData.description: On Enter click selects the focuses data
